languages.text: {n}Дознаватель подается к вам.{/n} "Мы — это здесь и сейчас. Давай не омрачать это время размышлениями о будущем, что скрыто тьмой. Прошу тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель подается к вам.{/n} "Мы — это здесь и сейчас. Давай не омрачать это время размышлениями о будущем, что скрыто тьмой. Прошу тебя".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix leans toward you.{/n} "The two of us — that's here and now. Let's not mar this time by thinking about a future that neither of us can predict. Please."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель подается к вам.{/n} "Мы — это здесь и сейчас. Давай не омрачать это время размышлениями о будущем, что скрыто тьмой. Прошу тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward you.{/n} "The two of us — that's here and now. Let's not mar this time by thinking about a future that neither of us can predict. Please."
{n}Heinrix leans toward you.{/n} "The two of us — that's here and now. Let's not mar this time by thinking about a future that neither of us can predict. Please."
{n}Heinrix leans toward you.{/n} "The two of us — that's here and now. Let's not mar this time by thinking about a future that neither of us can predict. Please."
{n}Heinrix leans toward you.{/n} "The two of us — that's here and now. Let's not mar this time by thinking about a future that neither of us can predict. Please."

languages.text: {n}海因里希朝你靠了过来。{/n}“此时此刻，你我二人就在这里。别再去想我们根本无法预知的未来了，拜托了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward you.{/n} "The two of us — that's here and now. Let's not mar this time by thinking about a future that neither of us can predict. Please."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希朝你靠了过来。{/n}“此时此刻，你我二人就在这里。别再去想我们根本无法预知的未来了，拜托了。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Lo nuestro es real, aquí y ahora. No arruinemos el momento pensando en un futuro que ninguno de los dos puede predecir. Por favor».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward you.{/n} "The two of us — that's here and now. Let's not mar this time by thinking about a future that neither of us can predict. Please."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Lo nuestro es real, aquí y ahora. No arruinemos el momento pensando en un futuro que ninguno de los dos puede predecir. Por favor».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたの方に身を乗り出す。{/n}「今ここにいるのは俺たち2人だけだ。お互いが予想できない未来について考えることで、大切な時間を台無しにするのはやめよう。お願いだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward you.{/n} "The two of us — that's here and now. Let's not mar this time by thinking about a future that neither of us can predict. Please."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたの方に身を乗り出す。{/n}「今ここにいるのは俺たち2人だけだ。お互いが予想できない未来について考えることで、大切な時間を台無しにするのはやめよう。お願いだ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se penche vers vous.{/n} « Nous, c'est ici et maintenant. Ne gâchons pas ces précieux instants ensemble à penser à un avenir que ni vous ni moi ne pouvons prédire. Je vous en prie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward you.{/n} "The two of us — that's here and now. Let's not mar this time by thinking about a future that neither of us can predict. Please."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se penche vers vous.{/n} « Nous, c'est ici et maintenant. Ne gâchons pas ces précieux instants ensemble à penser à un avenir que ni vous ni moi ne pouvons prédire. Je vous en prie. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix neigt sich zu dir.{/n} "Wir zwei – bleiben wir im Hier und Jetzt. Lassen wir uns nicht unsere Zeit kaputtmachen, indem wir über eine Zukunft nachdenken, die keiner von uns vorhersagen kann. Bitte."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward you.{/n} "The two of us — that's here and now. Let's not mar this time by thinking about a future that neither of us can predict. Please."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix neigt sich zu dir.{/n} "Wir zwei – bleiben wir im Hier und Jetzt. Lassen wir uns nicht unsere Zeit kaputtmachen, indem wir über eine Zukunft nachdenken, die keiner von uns vorhersagen kann. Bitte."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "İkimiz... Tam burada, şimdi varız. Birlikte geçirdiğimiz vakti her ikimizin de öngöremeyeceği bir geleceği düşünerek mahvetmeyelim. Lütfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward you.{/n} "The two of us — that's here and now. Let's not mar this time by thinking about a future that neither of us can predict. Please."
